duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the development and execution of brand strategy for the newest additions to the organization's portfolio.
Full responsibility for all aspects of the marketing mix, including advertising, media, retail, and consumer events to drive consumer awareness and profitable growth.
Budget planning and management with the proven ability to multi-task and to manage multiple stakeholders and projects at once.
Experience with successfully integrating new business a plus.

Excellent verbal/written communication skills appropriate for different audiences, (executive team, manufacturing, sales) and the ability to provide information in a succinct and easy to understand manner.

education_certification.credential: 15+ years of marketing and brand management experience with proven experience in new product launches. MBA a plus.
